languages.text: "Тем лучше. Значит я смогу добавить новую ноту страдания к каждой твоей смерти. И я не повторюсь ни разу".
"Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."
languages.original_text: "Тем лучше. Значит я смогу добавить новую ноту страдания к каждой твоей смерти. И я не повторюсь ни разу".

traits.locale_text: "Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."
"Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."
"Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."
"Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."
"Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."
"Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."

languages.text: «Bien. Así podré añadir una nueva nota de agonía a cada muerte. No necesitaré repetirme».
languages.original_text: "Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."

traits.locale_text: «Bien. Así podré añadir una nueva nota de agonía a cada muerte. No necesitaré repetirme».

languages.text: 「よろしい。あなたの死に新たな苦しみを加えることができる。そして、私は一度たりとも同じことを繰り返さない」
languages.original_text: "Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."

traits.locale_text: 「よろしい。あなたの死に新たな苦しみを加えることができる。そして、私は一度たりとも同じことを繰り返さない」

languages.text: “很好，这意味着我可以为你的每次死亡带来新的痛苦。我会让你每次都死得不一样。”
languages.original_text: "Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."

traits.locale_text: “很好，这意味着我可以为你的每次死亡带来新的痛苦。我会让你每次都死得不一样。”

languages.text: "Gut. Das bedeutet, ich kann jedem Tod noch eine neue Höllenqual hinzufügen. Und ich werde mich kein einziges Mal wiederholen."
languages.original_text: "Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."

traits.locale_text: "Gut. Das bedeutet, ich kann jedem Tod noch eine neue Höllenqual hinzufügen. Und ich werde mich kein einziges Mal wiederholen."

languages.text: « Bien. Je vais pouvoir ajouter une nouvelle note d'agonie à chacune de vos morts. Et je veillerai scrupuleusement à ne pas tomber dans la redondance. »
languages.original_text: "Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."

traits.locale_text: « Bien. Je vais pouvoir ajouter une nouvelle note d'agonie à chacune de vos morts. Et je veillerai scrupuleusement à ne pas tomber dans la redondance. »

languages.text: "Güzel. Bu da demek oluyor ki her bir ölümüne yeni bir ızdırap türü katabilirim. Kendimi bir kez olsun tekrar etmeyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Good. That means I can add a new note of agony to your every death. And I won't repeat myself even once."
